name: qmd
title: QMD
description: Search your markdown files with QMD (Quick Markdown Search) - fast BM25 keyword search, semantic vector search, and hybrid search with LLM reranking
author: karelvuong

commands.name: keyword-search
commands.title: Keyword Search
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Fast BM25 keyword search across your markdown collections

commands.name: vsearch
commands.title: Semantic Search
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Vector similarity search using semantic embeddings

commands.name: query
commands.title: Hybrid Search
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Best quality search combining keyword and semantic search with LLM reranking (uses more resources)

commands.name: add-collection
commands.title: Add Collection
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Create a new indexed collection from a folder of markdown files

commands.name: manage-collections
commands.title: Manage Collections
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: View, edit, rename, and remove collections

commands.name: update-collections
commands.title: Update Collections
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Scan all collections for new or changed files and update the index

commands.name: add-context
commands.title: Add Context
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Add a context description to improve search relevance for a collection or document

commands.name: manage-contexts
commands.title: Manage Contexts
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: View, edit, and remove context descriptions

commands.name: get-document
commands.title: Get Document
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Retrieve a document by its path or document ID

commands.name: status
commands.title: Status
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: View index health, collection stats, and embedding status

commands.name: generate-embeddings
commands.title: Generate Embeddings
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Generate vector embeddings for semantic search (runs in background)

commands.name: cleanup
commands.title: Cleanup
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Remove orphaned data and cache from the QMD index

commands.name: reset
commands.title: Reset QMD
commands.subtitle: QMD
commands.description: Delete all QMD data including collections, contexts, and embeddings (requires confirmation)

preferences.name: defaultResultCount
preferences.title: Default Result Count
preferences.description: Number of search results to display

preferences.name: defaultMinScore
preferences.title: Default Minimum Score
preferences.description: Minimum relevance score threshold (0-1). Leave at 0 to show all results.

preferences.name: bunExecutablePath
preferences.title: Custom Bun Executable Path
preferences.description: Optional: Full path to Bun executable (e.g., /opt/homebrew/bin/bun). Leave empty to auto-detect.

preferences.name: qmdExecutablePath
preferences.title: Custom QMD Executable Path
preferences.description: Optional: Full path to QMD executable (e.g., /opt/homebrew/bin/qmd). Leave empty to auto-detect.
